availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mustered in on September 4, 1861. The 4th and 5th Missouri Cavalry were consolidated into the 4th Missouri Cavalry on November 2, 1862 under Special Orders, No. 51. Mustered out on November 13, 1865. Commander(s): Colonel George E. Warring, Jr.

bibl.p: Annual Report of the Adjutant General of Missouri of 1864 (Jefferson City: W. A. Curry, Public Printer, 1865), 168-173; Annual Report of the Adjutant General of Missouri, For the Year Ending December 31, 1865 (Jefferson City: W. A. Curry, Public Printer, 1866), 335-337; Frederick Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion (Des Moines: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 165 and 1305.
